Неустаревающая классика. Довольно простая головоломка в которой постоянно думаешь: "А я как положено прошёл?". Но если хотите челленджа, то есть бонус уровни. У меня даже с гайдами припекло, но я рак, а у вас может и самим получится пройти.

Сюжетка:
 -сложность: 5 прогулок по парку из 10
 -сюжет: ну он наверное тут есть, но я в этом сомневаюсь.
 -длина: часа три на первое прохождение.

Бонусы:
 -сложность: 8 "где гайд?" из 10
 -сюжет: нет
 -длительность: ???

I knew all the spoilers and played it over a decade late. Maybe it wasn't as groundbreaking as it could've been if I played it blind and while it was still new, but honestly, I couldn't of cared less. This was amazing, and still holds up. Now excuse me while I play the sequel (Mostly because I'm excited to play Wheatly's arc for myself.)
很难想象这是十年前的游戏 传送门这种前卫的想法和出色的物理引擎属实厉害 特别是用传送门的多次飞跃产生加速度那关最让我喜欢 现在优惠打折1和2一起买只要四块钱建议大家可以入手 没看攻略纯手打每次过关后都会不禁佩服开发者和自己的脑洞 太好玩了

Bom, tentar descrever Portal é meio que... difícil. O game fala por si só, com uma história muito interessante e divertida. Humor ácido que só a nossa querida Glados pode nos proporcionar. Vale a pena cada minuto, e por falar em minuto, este é um jogo curto e que não exige muito do seu precioso tempo. recomendo a todos!!

Jogo muito bom. É antigo, mas vale muito a pena, ainda mais pelo preço. Pra quem busca zera-lo, vai finalizar muito rápido, mas ele possuí uns mapas bonus bem legais. Pelo preço que eu paguei (R$ 4,50 pelo conjunto - Portal 1 e Portal 2) valeu muito a pena.

Muito bom, ainda mais pelo preço já que comprei o jogo na promoção de fim de ano por menos de 2 reais.  Uma gameplay otima, n encontrei bugs e bem surpreendente.

Uns dos melhores jogos que eu já vi. Amei a música do final :3

[b]Note: Keep in mind that before playing [i]Portal,[/i] I played [i]Portal 2[/i] (on a console - not PC) a few years before. I just hadn't ever played the original, so I did.[/b]

[b]TL;DR: [i]Portal[/i] and [i]Portal 2[/i] are both amazing games. Just buy them.[/b]

[h1]Storyline: 10/10[/h1]
The storyline of the [i]Portal[/i] games is so in-depth and interesting (and Portal 1 plays a vital part in this storyline), I had to give it a 10/10.

[h1]Graphics: 9.5/10[/h1]
I mean, the graphics aren't [i]perfect[/i], but this was 2007, and they are very good.

[h1]Gameplay: 10/10[/h1]
If you like puzzle games, play [i]Portal.[/i] If you like adventure games, play [i]Portal.[/i] If you like action games, play [i]Portal.[/i] If you like casual games, play [i]Portal.[/i] It has a bit of everything, and every second of it is fun (except when you get frustrated because you can't figure something out!). [i]Portal[/i] is a bit short, but the enjoyment you get from it makes up for it. Maybe buy it when there is a sale (I got it for 99 cents). Oh, and after playing this, play [i]Portal 2.[/i]

[h1]Music: 10/10[/h1]
I mean, music isn't a [i]huge[/i] part of it, but it doesn't need to be. The credits song is wonderful and ties into the storyline very well.

[h1]Age rating: 12 and up*[/h1]
There is blood, but it just goes on the walls. There is nothing [i]too[/i] gory.

[h1][b]Overall Synopsis[/b]
Rating: 39.5/40
Age rating: 12 and up*
Recommended! ✔︎[/h1]

[b][i]*Of course, whether a game is okay for a child always depends on the child.[/i][/b]
[b]Thanks for reading my review! :D[/b]

portal was a amazing game back in 07 and in 2019 i can say that it still holds up. The graphics have aged but they have aged well, and the music is as great as it always was. The story for a puzzle based game is great and GLaDOS is still a great character. I highly recommend this game as i believe this is one of vales best games.

Гениально, было неожиданностью, когда валф выпустила головоломку без шутера, немногие поняли суть игры, ведь игровое комьюнити тех лет составляли более приземлённые в развитии люди, любители шутеров и кс 1.6. Это та самая игра где надо напрячь мозги, как игра в шахматы, нужно продумывать свои ходы, и сама отмосфера одинокого подземного центра, без единой души, нагнетает, и безысходность из-за которой финал, который добавили в обновлении, привозносит свой смысл. Это игра для людей любящих думать, а не клацать по мышке увидев врага, ещё меня порадовал саундтрэк в конце, она была как награда за прохождение, рекомендую

I really enjoyed this game. The concept was great. The puzzles were actually at the perfect difficulty. The story was entertaining and the game play was immersive.

The puzzles are nice, if you're looking for a challenge there are some extras levels that are harder than the main story
But the story felt incomplete [spoiler] you arrive in a lab as a test subject and I expected to know more about the lab and the experiments and what all of this was about, unfortunately all you get to know is that the cake is a lie. [/spoiler] The only thing that I liked was the interaction with GLaDOS throughout the whole game. Hopefully in the second portal we'll get a bit more than that
